blogPost.title: What markets are best suited for AI? Answer by @zaydenam, @cresta, CEO and Co-founder. https://t.co/KdcIt8NtxW https://t.co/ms9D1F6Kqo
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: AIに向いている市場は？Answer by @zaydenam, @cresta, CEO and Co-founder. https://t.co/KdcIt8NtxW https://t.co/ms9D1F6Kqo
哪些市场最适合使用人工智能？由@zaydenam，@cresta，首席执行官和联合创始人回答。https://t.co/KdcIt8NtxW https://t.co/ms9D1F6Kqo
哪些市場最適合使用人工智能？由@zaydenam，@cresta，首席執行官和聯合創始人回答。https://t.co/KdcIt8NtxW https://t.co/ms9D1F6Kqo

previous.title: Why is diversity lacking in the STEM field? Answer by @ainissaramirez, Scientist and the Author of "The Alchemy of Us". https://t.co/bbvdVPKcyZ https://t.co/kzeoylZWa6

localize.full_text: なぜ、STEM分野には多様性がないのか？科学者であり、「The Alchemy of Us」の著者でもある@ainissaramirez氏による回答です。https://t.co/bbvdVPKcyZ https://t.co/kzeoylZWa6
为什么在STEM领域缺乏多样性？回答者：@ainissaramirez，科学家，《我们的炼金术》作者。https://t.co/bbvdVPKcyZ https://t.co/kzeoylZWa6
爲什麼在STEM領域缺乏多樣性？回答者：@ainissaramirez，科學家，《我們的鍊金術》作者。https://t.co/bbvdVPKcyZ https://t.co/kzeoylZWa6

next.title: What should all women know about breast cancer risk? Answer by @KatePickert, Author of Radical: The Science, Culture and History of Breast Cancer in America. https://t.co/ediN5AFRiW https://t.co/Z4PhpELaRD

localize.full_text: 乳がんのリスクについて、すべての女性が知っておくべきことは？Answer by @KatePickert, Author of Radical: The Science, Culture and History of Breast Cancer in America. https://t.co/ediN5AFRiW https://t.co/Z4PhpELaRD
关于乳腺癌风险，所有妇女都应该知道什么？回答者：@KatePickert，《激进：美国乳腺癌的科学、文化和历史》作者。https://t.co/ediN5AFRiW https://t.co/Z4PhpELaRD
關於乳腺癌風險，所有婦女都應該知道什麼？回答者：@KatePickert，《激進：美國乳腺癌的科學、文化和歷史》作者。https://t.co/ediN5AFRiW https://t.co/Z4PhpELaRD
